content: **knitted hat in drops merino extra fine or drops karisma the piece is worked bottom up with folded brim ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-286 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150 g colour 40 powder pink or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150 g colour 66 light dusty pink **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need an 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
